flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: Punch the holes in the 15" pieces. They are both the same.
lines.text_raw: Punch the holes in the 15" pieces. They are both the same.

lines.text: Weld the pieces together, insuring everything is square.
lines.text_raw: Weld the pieces together, insuring everything is square.

lines.text: There should be a 6" space between the 15" pieces.
lines.text_raw: There should be a 6" space between the 15" pieces.

lines.text: Skip around so the plate doesnt warp.
lines.text_raw: Skip around so the plate doesnt warp.

lines.text: Weld both sides on all seams
lines.text_raw: Weld both sides on all seams

lines.text: Grind away the welds on one side of the plate.
lines.text_raw: Grind away the welds on one side of the plate.
